member.name: POLICY_LSA_SERVER_ROLE_INFO
member.summary: The POLICY_LSA_SERVER_ROLE_INFO structure is used to set and query the role of an LSA server. The and functions use this structure when their InformationClass parameters are set to PolicyLsaServerRoleInformation.

member.name: POLICY_LSA_SERVER_ROLE_INFO.LsaServerRole
member.summary: Specifies one of the values from the enumeration type to indicate a primary or backup LSA server.
